title: Which African country is the most powerful and technologically advanced? - Quora

response.answer_text: Probably still South Africa. The country inherented 1st World tech and know-how from the previous (European) government. Much of it has already been lost but even the little which remains, should be enough to pur SA 1st in Africa. Only one thing the white government did not want to hand over to the black government: The nuclear bombs! With all the decay and corruption South Africa is having nowadays, that was actually a good idea…

“Powerful" is a difficult concept to pin down without qualification, are you referring to economic or some other form of power? South Africa is still the most technologically advanced county in Africa, though there is rising competition.
